### Key Contacts

| **Field** | **Info** |
| --- | --- |

| End User Entity | Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) |
| Main Contact | Kate Mintzer (SPAC/PSPC) <kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca> |

### Tender Opportunity

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a qualified contractor to provide stormwater diversion services for the Bedford Institute of Oceanography (BIO) in Nova Scotia, Canada. This is an Invitation to Qualify opportunity for Construction or Engineering Services, classified under the Universal Standard Products and Services Code (USPSC) for Stormwater engineering (81101528). The contractor will be selected based on the lowest price.

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-07T14:00:00
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired) 

Please contact Kate Mintzer at kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca if you have any questions or need more information. 

Refer to the provided notices for complete details and further instructions.  

End of Tender Announcement.  #GovernmentTenders #TenderOpportunity #CanadaTenders

  MOP: Construction or Engineering Services |- Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

(Disclaimer : This message has been prepared only to inform. Its provision is not intended as an offer or an invitation to propose where none previously existed.)

 _Added additional information to better define the Interest in Clarification to identify the concept of works to be determined for Bid execution;- Project funds available for task delivery
